messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’m determined to go to the Pokémon
League, no matter how hard it is.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Losing won’t make me quit.
I mean, this is my dream!The Pokémon League isn’t going
anywhere, either.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
It doesn’t matter how long it takes,
I’m going to the Pokémon League!
